00017 class ImlGMRESSolver : public LinearSolverBase {
00018 
00019 public:
00020         ImlGMRESSolver(int nCells_, int nConns_, int nComps_, 
00021                         const Facilities* pFac, int preChoice_, double tol, int maxIter_, int m_);

00023 
00024         virtual void registerData(DataPool *dataPool);
00025         virtual bool solve(bool cR);    // solve AX=B
00026         // $PS$: write jacobian to files for adjoint
00027         virtual void writeJacobian(int ts, double dt, double dtbc, double dtbn, bool islast);
00028 
00029 protected:
00030         virtual void prepare(bool cR);  // preparation before solve
00031         virtual void setupA()=0;                        // setup matrix A
00032 
00033         int nElems;                                             // number of non-zero elements in A;
00034         int m;                                                  // number of iter before restart for GMRES
00035 
00036         CompRow_Mat_double matA;                // sparse matrix A in compressed row format
00037 
00038         double *X;                                              // solution X   
00039         MV_Vector_double *vecB, *vecX;  // reference to B and X
00040 
00041         MV_ColMat_double H;                             // a small m+1 by m natrix used by GMRES
00042 
00043         int n_d;                        // size of diagIndex 
00044 
00045         int *diagIndex, *offdAIndex, *offdBIndex;                       // reservoir part Jacobian indexes 
00046         int *RWJIndex, *WRJIndex, *WWJIndex;                                    // well part Jacobian indexes
00047 
00048         // ---- preconditioners ------------------
00049         virtual void createPreconditioner()=0;  // create preconditioner

00051         bool updatePreconditioner();    // update preconditioner
00052 
00053         virtual void createData()=0;    // create data  
00054 
00055         void reducedSolve();    // $PS$: for POD solve
